trans-unit.source: Creates a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically created by binding the control to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个多选择复选框组，可以通过将控件绑定到数据源动态创建。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Specifying List Layout](#SpecifyingListLayout) - [Specifying List Items](#SpecifyingListItems) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction The CheckBoxList control provides a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically generated with data binding.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#Introduction) - [指定列表布局](#SpecifyingListLayout) - [指定列表项](#SpecifyingListItems) - [可访问性](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法](#DeclarativeSyntax) # # 简介如何提供可以使用数据绑定动态生成多选复选框组组。

trans-unit.source: It contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection with members corresponding to individual items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 它包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>与列表中的各项相对应的成员的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine which items are checked, iterate through the collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定选中了哪些项，循环访问集合并测试<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>的列表中每个项的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can also use multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 还可以使用多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxList control is easier for creating a set of check boxes using data binding, while the individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control gives you greater control over layout.
trans-unit.target: 按控件是便于创建一组的复选框使用数据绑定，而各个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件为你提供了更好地控制布局。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: ## Specifying List Layout You can specify the way the list is displayed by using the and properties.
trans-unit.target: # # 指定可以指定列表的方式通过使用显示的列表布局和属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about layout options, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关布局选项的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A> is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A>设置为`RepeatDirection.Vertical`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` renders the list horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`水平呈现列表。

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> settings do not allow horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>设置不允许水平布局。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: ## Specifying List Items To specify items that you want to appear in the CheckBoxList control, place a `ListItem` element for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the CheckBoxList control.
trans-unit.target: # # 指定列表项，以指定你想要按控件中显示的项放置`ListItem`每个条目开始和结束标记的按控件之间的元素。

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxList control also supports data binding.
trans-unit.target: 按控件还支持数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: To bind the control to a data source, first create a data source, such as one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> objects, that contains the items to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要将控件绑定到数据源，请先创建的数据源，如之一<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>对象，它包含用于显示控件中的项。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data source to the CheckBoxList control.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法将数据源绑定到按控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties to specify which field in the data source to bind to the `Text` and `Value` properties of each list item in the control, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>属性以指定要绑定到数据源中哪个字段`Text`和`Value`属性的每个列表项在控件中，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxList control will now display the information from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 按控件现在将显示数据源的信息。

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items in the CheckBoxList control, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定如何控件中的选定的项，循环访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合并测试<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>集合中每个项目的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[如何︰ 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记辅助功能的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between the border and contents of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框和单元格内容之间的距离 （以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来控制单元格的内容和中的单元格的边框之间的间距<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell with the height of the tallest cell and width of the widest cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填充量添加到具有最高的单元格的高度和宽度中最宽的单元格的单元格的所有四个边<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source: The resulting cell size is applied uniformly to all cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 最终的单元格大小统一应用于中的所有单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source: The distance (in pixels) between the border and contents of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 边框和单元格内容之间的距离 （以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为-1，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格之间的距离 （以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来控制各个单元格之间的间距<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source: This property is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 在垂直方向和水平应用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The distance (in pixels) between cells.
trans-unit.target: 单元格之间的距离 （以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Processes the posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 处理的已发布的数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: 主要由控件开发人员在派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>的自定义控件使用 LoadPostData 方法

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method indicates whether the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: LoadPostData 方法指示是否的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制已更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>

trans-unit.source: In other words, it determines whether each list item in the control has the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> value as the last posted value.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，它确定是否在控件中的每个列表项具有相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>上次发布的值的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: A user selecting or clearing an item in the control changes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property value for the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text alignment for the check boxes within the group.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置组中复选框的文本对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify whether the text associated with the check boxes appears on the left or right of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定是否与对应的复选框关联的文本将显示在左侧或右侧的复选框。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `TextAlign.Right`, the text is displayed to the right of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`TextAlign.Right`，右侧的复选框会显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `TextAlign.Left`, the text is displayed to the left of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`TextAlign.Left`，左边的复选框会显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified label text alignment is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的标签文本对齐方式不是一个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign"></xref>值。
